name: US Army Truck Driver Battle 3D- Driving Car in War
name_original: US Army Truck Driver Battle 3D- Driving Car in War
description:
Perform your duty as a military truck driver and rescue the wounded troops! Your country needs your driving skills behind the enemy lines. Show your extreme driving skills by driving some heavy army trucks and surprise your enemy. Do you have what it takes to be a military war truck driver? Let’s check it out in multiple army missions and battle field challenges. In this simulation game your task is to take the soldiers to the war field and also bring them back to the base camp from unchartered territories.

Drive in rush and don’t let any soldier injured while passing through the cross fire. This simulation game is consisting of 15 challenging levels of army operations which will leads you to next level of excitement and thriller. To drive more precisely multiple camera views are available to track your way through enemy area.

Features
• 15 missions of battle field adventure.
• Multiple camera views to drive precisely.
• 4 military trucks to select from.
• Smooth controls and user friendly interface.
• Realistic graphics and high quality background sound.
